data.title: Parker Meggitt: Read reviews and ask questions
data.meta_description: Learn what working and interviewing at Parker Meggitt is really like. Read real reviews, ask and answer questions.
data.text:
We are Parker Meggitt.

Innovation is at the heart of everything we do.

Itâ€™s why we consistently deliver solutions for the most challenging environments and why customers worldwide rely on our advanced technologies, products and services for aerospace, defense and selected energy applications.

With 39 facilities worldwide, Parker Meggitt draws on over 160 years of expertise to enhance the lives of people across the globe. 73,000 aircraft rely on our critical components every day; over 80% of military fighter programs have our wheel and brake systems; and we keep the lights on for 1 billion people across the globe.

We have a clear vision: Enabling the Extraordinary; To Fly; To Power; To Live. And our vision is underpinned by our core values: Teamwork; Integrity; Excellence.

Meggitt is now part of Parker Aerospace, bringing together industry-leading experience and innovation and a more powerful product and service offering for the aerospace and defense industries. Collectively we bring to market a wider range of breakthrough airframe and engine technologies that solve greater customer challenges. We will continue to play a leading role in enabling the next generation of sustainable aviation and accelerate our work supporting aftermarket customers.
